resistibility_mechanics.description: Resistibility determines whether debuffs and buffs can be resisted by the target champion or boss. RES stat reduces debuff land chance, ACC stat increases debuff land chance.

debuff_landing_formula.description: Debuff land rate = (Attacker ACC - Target RES + 200) / 400, capped between 0% and 95%. There is always a minimum 5% resist chance (or 10% based on some sources).
debuff_landing_formula.notes: Formula applies to ALL resistable debuffs and buff removal attempts. Does NOT apply to non-resistable mechanics (e.g., UNM Clan Boss stun).

examples.safety_level: Minimum bare minimum (37.5% land rate = 50% uptime = gaps)
Acceptable for non-critical debuffs (50% land rate)
Overkill (87.5% land rate, approaching cap, wasted stats)

acc_thresholds_vs_unm_300_res.notes: Against UNM Clan Boss (300 RES), 390 ACC = 72.5% land rate (near-perfect). 450+ ACC is wasted (approaching 95% cap with diminishing returns).

non_resistable_mechanics.description: Some mechanics CANNOT be resisted regardless of RES stat. These mechanics have 100% success rate (unless blocked by immunity buffs).

examples.notes: Boss stun lands 100% of the time regardless of target RES. RES stat is USELESS for stun mitigation. Must use Block Debuffs, Increase SPD, or designated stun target strategy.
Some True Fear effects cannot be resisted (champion-specific)
Petrification from Mithrala's passive cannot be resisted (activates on debuff placement)
Block Revive CAN be resisted (not non-resistable, requires ACC check)

buff_removal_mechanics.description: Buff removal attempts (e.g., Strip Buffs, Steal Buffs) use the same ACC/RES formula. Higher ACC = higher chance to remove buffs.
buff_removal_mechanics.notes: Some champions have guaranteed buff removal (ignores ACC/RES check). Check champion skill descriptions for 'ignores [Resist]' or 'cannot be resisted'.

debuff_champions.notes: Debuff champions (Decrease DEF/ATK, HP Burn, Poison) MUST hit ACC thresholds for reliable uptime. Below 250 ACC = massive gaps in debuff coverage.

support_champions.notes: Support champions (healers, cleansers, revivers) benefit from high RES to avoid crowd control in Arena. RES is LESS important for Clan Boss (boss uses non-resistable stun).

clan_boss_specific.res_value: LOW (boss uses non-resistable stun, RES is wasted stat)
clan_boss_specific.acc_value: HIGH (Decrease DEF/ATK, HP Burn require 350-390 ACC for reliable uptime)
clan_boss_specific.recommendation: Minimize RES on Clan Boss builds, maximize ACC for debuff champions. Redirect RES substats to DEF/HP/SPD for survivability.

arena_specific.res_value: HIGH (avoid crowd control, resist buff removal)
arena_specific.acc_value: VERY HIGH (land debuffs on high-RES enemies, 400+ ACC common in Gold+ Arena)
arena_specific.recommendation: Debuff champions need 400+ ACC for Gold+ Arena (enemies have 350-450 RES). Support champions need 350+ RES to avoid crowd control.

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with community testing, formula confirmed by Plarium
metadata.notes: Comprehensive resistibility mechanics for ACC/RES stat optimization and debuff uptime calculations
